name: The Dream Vandal Demo
description:
My brother and I have spent a week on this as a proof of concept for ourselves of the Gameboy inspired Metroidvania we are developing titled The Dream Vandal. It's currently very short with one enemy, one boss fight, two health upgrades and one power up.

The fights are bit buggy, especially towards the end of the boss fight, but other than that it should work fine.

This is absolutely not a complete game, it's not even a complete demo, but I don't have much time to work on this after today so I wanted to release what I had so far.
